I expect the franchise tag to continue to operate as it has in prior seasons and clubs to be permitted to exercise their rights under the tag, Jeff Pash , the NFL's general counsel, said Thursday. Last night a source close to the X Factor host said: Cheryl Cole considered going back to her maiden name but now she has dismissed the idea. People knew who she was as a Cheryl Cole but she has only become truly famous as Cheryl Cole . yet but seeds have been sown by people like Black Eyed Peas singer Will.i.am and it is important she creates a lasting brand. It would be madness to change back. The Sunday Mirror can also confirm that Simon Cowell has promised her a job as a judge on the US X Factor. He has spent the past few days convincing American producers that she will be a huge success.
